communere_description: Scaled the MARS platform from concept to production used by clinical teams. Cut feature lead time by streamlining delivery, improved data accuracy with AI-assisted workflows, and raised system reliability through proactive error reduction and clear SLAs. Drove roadmap execution, wrote the playbook for incident response, and mentored devs to ship faster with fewer regressions.
selectedgeeks_description: Owned core admin experiences for a multi-tenant platform. Launched features that supported daily operations at scale, improved onboarding time for new clients, and reduced operational support requests through better UX and observability. Established quality bars, introduced lightweight testing habits, and kept dashboards responsive for decision-makers.
